suite.name: MyStore

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is false.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is false.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Esta suite representa os testes do DEMOCENTER para a aplicação web MyStore
